name: Mankey
flavorText:
Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

previous.name: Golduck
previous.flavorText:
Often seen swim­
ming elegantly by
lake shores. It is often mistaken
for the Japanese
monster, Kappa.

next.name: Primeape
next.flavorText:
Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

pokemon.name: Annihilape
pokemon.flavorText: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.
